abstract: Bank C.D.’s, bonds and money market funds may offer peace of mind to nervous investors.
snippet: Bank C.D.’s, bonds and money market funds may offer peace of mind to nervous investors.
lead_paragraph: EVER since the Dow Jones industrial average first reached 14,000 in mid-July, a volatile stock market has tumbled and churned, turning many investors away from cheery calculations of capital gains to fretful thoughts of capital preservation.

headline.main: Shedding Stock-Market Vertigo (but Still Making Some Money)
headline.print_headline: Shedding Stock-Market Vertigo (but Still Making Some Money)
